S04n454:1: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-arhantaḥ punarbhagavatā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n454:3: yasyāṃ ca rātrau tathāgato'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho yasyāṃ ca rātrau parinirvṛtaḥ,
S04n454:4: etasminnantare bhagavatā ekamapyakṣaraṃ nodāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhṛtam |
S04n454:5: sadā samāhitāśca tathāgatā na vitarkayanti na vyavacārayanti |
S04n454:7: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ca vijñānānāṃ kṣaṇaparaṃparābhedalakṣaṇaṃ nirdiśyate ?
S04n454:12: cañcāmāṇavikā sundarikā pravrājikā yathā dhautapātrādīni ca bhagavan karmāvaraṇāni dṛśyante |
S04n454:17: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
S04n454:18: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat-nirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇadhātuṃ saṃdhāya bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca caritavatāṃ protsāhanārtham |
S04n454:19: santi hi mahāmate bodhisattvacaryācāriṇaḥ iha anyeṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu |
S04n454:20: yeṣāṃ śrāvakayānanirvāṇābhilāṣasteṣāṃ śrāvakayānarucivyāvartanārthaṃ mahāyānagatiprotsāhanārthaṃ ca tannirmitaśrāvakānnirmāṇakāyairvyākaroti,
S04n454:23: na hi mahāmate śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ kleśāvaraṇaprahāṇaviśeṣo vimuktyekarasatayā |
S04n454:29: pūrvadharmasthititāṃ saṃdhāya apūrvacaramasya cābhāvātpūrvaprahiṇairevākṣaraistathāgato na vitarkya na vicārya dharmaṃ deśayati |
S04n454:32: sapta mahāmate manomanovijñānacakṣurvijñānādayaḥ kṣaṇikāḥ vāsanāhetutvātkuśalānāsravapakṣarahitāḥ na saṃsāriṇaḥ |
S04n454:35: nirmitanairmāṇikānāṃ mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ vajrapāṇiḥ pārśvānugato na maulānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām |
S04n454:36: maulo hi mahāmate tathāgataḥ sarvapramāṇendriyavinivṛttaḥ sarvabālaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthyānām |
S04n454:40: na teṣu tathāgato na cānyatra tebhyastathāgataḥ |
S04n454:44: punaraparaṃ mahāmate ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ nirodhāducchedadṛṣṭimāśrayanti bālapṛthagjanāḥ,
S04n454:50: trīṇi yānānyayānaṃ ca buddhānāṃ nāsti nirvṛtiḥ |
S04n454:55: yānti tenaiva nānyena atasteṣāṃ na nirvṛtiḥ || 3 ||
